name: Querg Draughts
description:
Querg Draughts is a checkers game in medium resolution written in C for one player.

The game can be played at 11 different difficulty levels. At level one the computer may use 0,5 seconds to calculate it's next move and at level 11 it may use 4 minutes. To make a move just click on the piece you want to move and then on the square you want to move it to. Only legal moves are allowed. If you change your mind after clicking on a piece just click on it again to cancel the move.
